extracted_playbook.title: Install Software Update 4.19.10
extracted_playbook.description: Install the new software update version 4.19.10 for the MagLink LX console through DFS's authorized service organizations in North America.

extracted_playbook.title: Install MagLink Consoles Behind Firewalls
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that MagLink consoles are installed behind firewalls for enhanced security.

extracted_playbook.title: Monitor and Install Updates Timely
extracted_playbook.description: Regularly monitor and install updates for MagLink products to ensure they are up-to-date.

extracted_playbook.title: Contact DFS Customer Support
extracted_playbook.description: Reach out to DFS customer support for any questions about operations or updates of MagLink software. North American users can call 877-679-8324.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the MagLink operating offline or disconnected from a network?

extracted_playbook.title: Access DFS Proprietary Portal
extracted_playbook.description: Registered MagLink customers should access technical information, updates, and technical bulletins via the DFS proprietary portal.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Conduct proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures as recommended by CISA.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Defensive Measures for ICS
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended cybersecurity strategies for proactive defense of ICS assets as per CISA guidelines.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity to CISA
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect Against Social Engineering Attacks
extracted_playbook.description: Do not click web links or open attachments in unsolicited email messages. Refer to CISA guidelines on avoiding email scams and social engineering attacks.
